content.text:
# Ardashir (king of Marv)

Coin of Ardashir
Ardashir (Middle Persian: 50px) was a Sasanian prince, who ruled Marv from ca. 240 to 262. He was either a brother or son of the Sasanian king Ardashir I (r. 224-242), who had installed him as the ruler of Marv, which was the outpost of his empire in the north-east.
